Title: Relates to cloud service utilization and readiness of state agencies
Summary: Requires all state agencies to utilize third-party, commercial cloud computing solutions for any new information technology or telecommunications investments on or before June thirtieth, two thousand twenty.
LawCode: Amd ยง101, add ยง103-b, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to cloud service utilization and readiness of state agencies
